name: SCUBADivePlanner
0:
”Alexa ask Dive Planner to plan 90 feet for 20 minutes.”
”Alexa ask Dive Planner to plan 180 feet for 20 minutes using 18 45 and the VPMB model.”
”Alexa ask Dive Planner to list decompression stops.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dive planner
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Dive Planner skill gives Alexa the ability to compute custom decompression profiles for SCUBA diving. This skill follows the philosophy that there is no such thing as a “no decompression dive”. No matter how shallow the depth or short the bottom time, by diving you will incur the poorly understood consequences of breathing mixed gasses at an atmospheric pressure well beyond our normal operating range. Care should be taken to carefully control the ascent rate and follow a decompression stop protocol for all dives, even those within recreational no-stop limits, to minimize the stresses on our bodies.
